revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The souls magazine of Scripture truths, digested into an historical dialogue, to inform the ignorant, reform the wicked, awake the drowsey, and revive Christianity b..."
revision.text: Possibly: The souls magazine of Scripture truths, digested into an historical dialogue, to inform the ignorant, reform the wicked, awake the drowsey, and revive Christianity by faith and obedience. (London : Printed by S. Negus, for the author; and sold by J. Peele, at Locke's-Head in Pater-Noster-Row, and W. Hinchliffe under the Royal Exchange; W. Smith, Bookseller in Cambridge, and W. Chase, Bookseller in Norwich, 1722.) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408678~S1
